headline: Micron Stock Falls After Earnings. The Detail That Overshadowed Strong Results.
summary: Micron  Technology stock was falling early Friday as guidance for lower profit margins overshadowed its better-than-expected earnings.  Micron shares were down 7% at $95.83  in early trading.  Micron said that sales of HBM chips surpassed the $1 billion milestone in its fiscal second quarter, ahead of its own estimates and up 50% sequentially.
